data.title: Tight Squeeze
data.text: Tight squeeze is a perfect title for this review since we visit here every year for Roar On The Shore.  This should explain that it becomes overly populated because it's a favorite place for all to be.  Service is rather fast given the amount of people that visit during that weekend.  The restroom is large and highly appreciated.  Very seldom do I have to stand in line.  Drinks are not overpriced.

data.title: The best place to be!
data.text: Live entertainment in a relaxed, fun atmosphere.  Top notch staff and great prices.   Highly recommended!

data.title: Love Tiki Bars
data.text: Love the tiki bar in the middle of Erie, PA! We went to see a local band, and it was pretty crowded. Took a while to get a drink at the bar. It was just fun to people watch and see everyone having a good time. Didn't have any food, just drinks. Will definitely go back when I'm in the area again.

data.title: Relaxing Saturday night
data.text: We went to see The Gilligans perform,and had a few drinks.The staff was very friendly and pleasant.The bathrooms were amazing,very clean and recently updated.The bar is outside and was a lot of fun and refreshing.We will be back.They serve snack food s only.

data.title: Only place to go for Erie Summers!
data.text: By far, downtown Erie's summer entertainment Jem. The best of local Live bands and DJs outside with a large Tiki bar, great food, and fire pits. Pretty cool Nightclub inside if you are into that. Basically only place I go out to in the summer.

data.title: Summer time
data.text: This is a great happy hour spot for bands in the summer.It has a Caribbean feel with tiki bars and fire pits.

data.title: Bartender ripping people off
data.text: Been going here for years during roar on the shore, I've been in the food service/bar industry all my life, every year I watch at least one bartender rip people off, the first clue is when they stand between you and the drink they pouring, I had my girlfriend stand on other side of bar and I ordered a jack and coke and a absolute and vodka, sure enough he stood where I couldn't see him pour and used bottles out of the speed rack (the cheap stuff) this guy even took it a step further, I gave him a 20 for the drinks, he brought me 2.50 in change and quickly moved away, I wasn't going to let that slide, after about 5 minutes and me starting to raise my voice he came back and started yelling at me that I only gave him a 10,  he went to the register a brought back a old crumpled up ten and said this is what you gave me, I said again in a much louder voice and he said keep it then, to the owner you got to watch your bartenders, they ripping you off and your customers

data.title: if you're trying to have fun don't go
data.text:
if you are not a basic female 
and if you have good moves-- don't go. you will be prosecute if you're not grinding on a strangers junk. good luck and good night. oh, by the way-- I'm a successful young professional from New York and this place sucks:

data.title: Great outdoor place!
data.text: Great place for happy hour during the summer. The guys cook your burgers and such on the outdoor grills right in front of you and it makes the whole place smell Great!! Love this place!

data.title: Yum
data.text: The variety of food and beverage choices was a great surprise. The service was top notch, we very much enjoyed dining out doors by the lake.
